attributes.additional_details:
We call upon the UK Government to introduce opennes and transparency into the price of fuel at the pumps so that we the public can identify the cost of the actual fuel and the tax levied on it by the government.

The pricing of fuel by the litre is unjustified, it causes confusion and serves to disguise the real costs of fuel. Therefore we also call upon the UK government to allow or require the reintroduction of pricing petrol and diesel by the gallon
